title: Tim Burt - The Biggest Mistake Marketers Make When Advertising And How To Avoid It
itunes:title: Tim Burt - The Biggest Mistake Marketers Make When Advertising And How To Avoid It
description: Tim Burt is credited with more than 30,000 commercials globally over the last 26 years - from Presidential campaigns and multi-national corporations, to countless small businesses.
